en.name: Bill Tyros
en.summary: Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in the video game, financial, and hospitality industries.

list.title: Senior Software Engineer @ Sonder
list: Developed data migration system in Ruby for transferring data from an internal PMS to an external one.
Developed availability health metrics that contributed to a $10M year-over-year profit increase.
Maintained a distribution system in Ruby to sync listings on Airbnb, Booking, and Expedia.
Refactored a 300k+ LOC legacy Ruby on Rails codebase, upgrading to Ruby 3.3 and Rails 7.1 for improved performance and maintainability.
Enhanced and maintained a pricing system in Python, optimizing rates based on supply/demand.

list.title: Software Engineer @ Morgan Stanley
list: Designed and implemented a system in Python to aggregate data from internal and third-party sources.
Built self-service web applications in TypeScript/Angular (for agile/devops metrics and JIRA administration), streamlining workflows and reducing manual overhead.

list.title: Programmer @ Framestore VR
list: Engineered an art asset pipeline for Unreal Engine 4, creating C++ and Python plugins to automate workflows and improve production efficiency.

list.title: Programmer @ Borealys Games
list: Developed core gameplay systems and UI in Unity (C#) for Mages of Mystralia ensuring a polished player experience and robust game architecture.
Languages: Python, Ruby, C#, Go, TypeScript, JavaScript, C++
CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, CircleCI, Buddy

list.title: Interactive Real-Time Systems Development @ University of Sherbrooke
